content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

No structures have been created on the map as of the latest execution steps. All attempts to place entities have failed, resulting in no entities being present on the map.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure the target tile is not occupied or obstructed before attempting to place an entity. Multiple attempts to place a Wooden Chest and a Stone Furnace failed due to obstructions or occupied tiles.

### Errors in movement commands
- When using the `move_to` function, ensure that the indices provided are integers. Errors occurred due to incorrect data types being used as indices in movement commands.
